name: In A Loop
description:
This game is based on the 47'th Ludam Dare's theme - Stuck In A Loop.

In which, when you enter the game you have to enter your instance value then you will see a loop condition by going on to the condition button and then you have to pass a false value in the loop runner in order to break the loop. 

Variable Playground - There will be one more scene which is called variable playground in which two pills will be spawning , one blue and another red. The red one decreases your value and blue increases so take them accordingly and destroy if no t needed by left clicking on the mouse button and player will swing the variable sword.

Enjoy the game do give the feedback ;)
